TopicTitle: question about mod for delta 2 rockets

Articles.Content:
Hi everyone 

Is there a proper mod for delta 2 rockets.[removed link to defunct website] I've found and installed this but it has two problems 

fairing won't open it just blows 

when I decouple the main tank the remaining part tumbles.

 

 

Is there a proper mod for delta 2 rockets

The Delta II's in KK's Launchers Pack have not been updated to the most recent version of KSP. In particular, with the fairings blowing up, the collider that they used is no longer supported by KSP, so it assigns a rectangular collider to the part. When you decouple, the physics engine thinks the payload and the fairing are occupying the same space, and therefore causes them to demolish each other.
